content:
Genoa coach Davide Nicola has claimed that he will ‘accept whatever decision that will be made’ but will be ‘prepared to resume’.
The Rossoblu sit 17th in Serie A, only just outside the relegation zone, and Nicola had helped the Grifone turn their season aro… [+1995 chars]
